ComicInfo.Summary: The cast of Peanuts battle the Punisher, Lobo battles Cathy. Superman attacks Dagwood Bumstead and Sylvester battles Alfred.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:12:11. [CVDB146256] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:37:49. [Issue ID 250668]

ComicInfo.Title: Updated Board Games; McPoop's Best Friend; America's 10 Deadliest Amusement Park Rides; Hanging with Mr. Pooper; One Day in the Police Station...; Monster Hockey League All-Star Game Official Souvenir Program; Cracked's Plan to Balance the Federal Budget in One Year; Patient Complaints About Witch Doctors; Comic Book vs. Comic Strip Crossover Battles!; Cracked Lawsuits; Specialized 'In Case of...' Boxes for Everyday Situations; The Official Guide to Snowboarding; Resume Embellishment for Kids; One Night in a Cave; The Dumb & Dumber Mask Meets Ace Ventura
